settings.title: IV Therapy
settings.body:
What is IV Therapy? 

IV Therapy or Intravenous Therapy is a treatment that delivers vitamins and supplements directly to the bloodstream. Supplying nutrients through the veins is considered more efficient as it bypasses the digestive system. 

The body does not absorb all the nutrients from food and supplements during the digestive process. However, the absorption rate is much higher and faster with IV therapy.

settings.question: NAD+ Therapy
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: OPTIMAL HEALTH AND ANTI-AGING

NAD+ or nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide is a coenzyme of niacin (a type of Vitamin B3), which occurs naturally in the cells of the body and helps the cells produce energy. NAD+ levels decline with age and can lead to chronic health issues such as heart disease, diabetes, and vision loss. Lack of NAD+ can also cause premature aging. 

NAD+ therapy infuses NAD into the bloodstream and boosts overall health. 

Benefits:

• Optimizes cognitive function

• Increases energy

• Helps with weight management

• Slows Aging

settings.question: Myers Cocktail
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: OPTIMAL HEALTH

Myers Cocktail is a potent blend of vitamins and minerals designed to treat a variety of health concerns. The nutrient infusion was developed by Dr. John Myers and includes B-vitamins, Vitamin C, calcium, and magnesium.  

Myers Cocktail has been used to successfully treat a wide range of medical conditions such as fibromyalgia, chronic fatigue, migraines, and muscle spasms.

Benefits: 

• Strengthens immune system

• Boosts bone health

• Improves memory

• Fights fatigue

settings.question: Toradol
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: RECOVERY 

Toradol is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used for short-term relief of moderate to severe pain and inflammation. Toradol works by blocking the production of certain chemicals that cause pain and inflammation in the body.  

Toradol is used to treat post-surgical pain or pain associated with chronic conditions. Reducing pain and inflammation speeds up recovery and makes the process more comfortable.

Benefits:

• Relieves pain

• Reduces inflammation

settings.question: Zofran
settings.answer:
CATEGORY: HEALING 

Zofran is a medication that prevents nausea. It is commonly administered intravenously to people undergoing radiation and chemotherapy treatments who struggle with nausea. Zofran can also ease the discomfort of nausea after surgery. 

Benefits: 

• Reduces nausea

• Treats vomiting

• Alleviates upset stomach
